name: Logan

topics.response_text: Who the fuck are you?

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I didn't catch your name.
topics.response_text: Name's Logan. What the hell do you want?
That's none of your damn business.
Tell you what. Bring us those suits, and you can come with us while we loot the town. You can keep a share.
It's about damn time. You ready to go?
Anything branded by the NCR related to weapons, computers, or radios.
Same stuff. Any NCR weapons, computer parts, or radio parts.
Yeah, whatever.
You must be crazy if you're just "passing through" this place.
Then why are you in here bothering me instead of out there hunting them?
Look, I don't need your shit. Either get out of the way or things are gonna get rough.
Look if you really want to help either get the fuck out of our way or hack that damn computer over there.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me anything about Camp Searchlight?
topics.response_text: All I know is that the whole place is filled with radiation, there are nasty creatures roaming about.
Some caravan company, Crimson something or other. Some old broad said they're looking to expand their business, be more competitive or some shit.

topics.topic_text: What are you looking for in the computer?
topics.response_text: The location of some radiation suits. I found an inventory list that says they should be here but I can't seem to find them anywhere.
Yeah you do that.
Well then, get your ass out there.

topics.topic_text: I'd better get a bigger share for this.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Fuck you. You'll get the same as everyone else.
Good, now get going.
Just go already.
Good, we're going to the Police Station first. Here's the key, we'll follow you there.

topics.topic_text: Hang on, I gotta take care of something first.
topics.response_text: Well hurry the fuck up, I don't wanna wait all day.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something before we go?
topics.response_text: What?
We're gonna check out the police and fire stations. They were the buildings used the most by the NCR, so they're our best chance at good shit.

topics.topic_text: What do you hope to find?
topics.response_text: Anything that's valuable. You done with the questions yet?
It's about damn time.

topics.topic_text: Nope, I'm getting out of here.
topics.response_text: Look, I'm not leaving this place 'til I have what I came for. I'll be in the storage basement if you change your mind.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, my mistake, I'm still in.
topics.response_text: Damn right it is. Now let's get going.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.
Don't think too hard, you'll hurt yourself.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Whatever.

description:
Logan is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

A seasoned prospector working for the Crimson Caravan, currently stationed in the underground storage area beneath Camp Searchlight. He's weathered by years of exposure to the harsh Mojave elements, with calloused hands and a keen eye for valuable minerals and pre-War artifacts.

Logan's Personality: Pragmatic, cautious, and somewhat cynical after years of surviving in the wasteland. Logan values loyalty and efficiency, especially when it comes to business. While not overtly hostile, he's guarded and slow to trust strangers, particularly those who might jeopardize his operations. He has a dry sense of humor that surfaces during moments of respite.

Logan's Backstory: Born and raised in the NCR, Logan learned the trade of prospecting from his father, who worked the mines near Redding before the region fell into decline. After his father's death, Logan struck out on his own, eventually finding work with the Crimson Caravan due to their extensive network and need for skilled prospectors. He's been with the Caravan for nearly a decade, establishing himself as reliable and competent.
